item.title: InZOI: How to Increase Motor Development Skill
item.description:
Throughout the daily lives of your characters in InZOI , you will manage aspects such as Ambitions, Needs, and the development of Relationships and Skills. Skills are important, as some actions, hobbies, and career paths are locked behind restrictions that require you to increase Skills to a specific level.

Motor Development is one of the numerous Skills available for your Zoi to develop as they grow up. In particular, this Skill is important when it comes to engaging in physical activities and hobbies, so knowing how to increase it can be beneficial to your playthrough. Here's a rundown on how to increase the Motor Development Skill in InZOI .

How to Increase the Motor Development Skill in InZOI

In InZOI , Motor Development is one of the few Skills in the game that is restricted to child Zois only. As child Zois age up into teenagers and adults, this Skill later splits off into Fitness, which they can continue to progress. However, if you're planning for your Zoi to chase an athletic job or lifestyle once they grow up, then getting them started with some strong Motor Development Skills can come in handy.

To increase Motor Development in InZOI , child Zois must interact with one of the available pieces of fitness equipment or physical game options available to them. The first way in which this can be done is by playing with a basketball. You can either find these at locations around the city, such as the school, or you can purchase a basketball and even a hoop for your property.

You can then interact with this object by clicking on it and choosing to practice your dribbling or shooting skills - both of which enhance Motor Development. Alternatively, you can also do the same thing by having your Zoi interact with a soccer ball rather than a basketball. Playing either of these sports is a great way for children to get rid of some extra energy, have fun, and raise Motor Development at the same time.

The second way in which you can increase Motor Development is by having your child Zoi unwind by practicing some poses on a Yoga mat . These are fairly small, so they are a worthy addition to any room or outdoor area around your home. The third way that you can raise the Motor Development skill is by having your Zoi use a treadmill to lightly jog or run. This is one of the fastest ways to increase Motor Development, so if you're looking to speed up the skill, then a treadmill may prove to be a worthy purchase.

item.title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A's Battle Royale Could Be Hiding A Mythical Pokemon
item.description:
After finally revealing how Pokemon Legends: Z-A got its name, the game's new approach to trainer battles and its Z-A Royale premise could allude to the potential return of one particular Mythical Pokemon. With a projected launch date set for late 2025, Game Freak has been pulling out the stops with new gameplay trailers showcasing some of its most anticipated and significant features, ranging from revealing its intergenerational trio of starter Pokemon to flipping the script with Pokemon 's battle mechanics. Among these was Legends: Z-A 's "Z-A Royale," a new ranked battling system that could be the game's replacement for gyms and leagues.

However, beyond the goal of graduating from Rank Z to Rank A, Game Freak has hinted that reaching the Z-A Royale's highest rank will grant these trainers one wish. While it's not unusual for Pokemon games to feature strange and fantastical storylines, such as Wishing Stars and Pieces being tied to Pokemon Sword and Shield 's Dynamaxing gimmick, it does seem odd for Pokemon Legends: Z-A to refer to its reward as a "wish." Given that wishes are not part of the lore behind Legends: Z-A 's mascot Legendary Zygarde and with Mega Evolutions returning, this could be teasing the potential return of Jirachi, the Wish Pokemon.

Pokemon Legends: Z-A's Battle Royale's Wish Could Be Crucial to its Story

Following the original announcement of Legends: Z-A , speculation has focused on the possible connections between Lumiose City's urban redevelopment and Zygarde's role in maintaining the balance of Kalos' ecosystem. Though this could still explain Zygarde's return as Pokemon Legends: Z-A 's mascot Legendary Pokemon since it has featured several times in the game's trailers, the reveal of the Z-A Royale and its wish-granting reward raises new questions about the game's story. While this "wish" could ultimately be an odd word choice and might connect to Legends: Z-A 's Quasartico Inc., it doesn't appear to fit with what's known about Zygarde's lore.

Zygarde Doesn't Fit The Mold For Granting Pokemon Legends: Z-A's Wish

Between its first appearance in Pokemon X and Y as the final third in its Legendary trio and its subsequent revamp in Gen 7's Pokemon Sun and Moon and Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon , Zygarde has been an outlier among Legendary Pokemon with its unique 10%, 50%, and Complete forms. But like Gen 5's Kyurem and the hypothetical "Pokemon Gray," the announcement of Legends: Z-A seemed to indicate that Game Freak is giving Zygarde its "Pokemon Z" moment. However, aside from the possibility that Zygarde is returning to prevent Lumiose City's redevelopment, the Legendary Pokemon has so far never granted wishes.

This could potentially conflict with Legends: Z-A 's predecessor, Pokemon Legends: Arceus , which utilized its mascot Mythical Pokemon to justify how the player wound up traveling back in time to Hisui. As a result, even though a leaked list of Mega Evolutions has included Zygarde, which suggests its importance in the game, the lore and presumable storyline behind Legends: Z-A 's Legendary mascot doesn't fit the Z-A Royale's wish-granting premise. However, while Zygarde might not tie back to these wishes, the return of Mega Evolutions and Quasartico Inc. itself could offer further clues as to which Mythical Pokemon that could be involved instead.

Between Mega Evolutions and Wishes, Jirachi Could Return in Pokemon Legends: Z-A

Beyond Jirachi's existing role as the Wish Pokemon, the quasar inspiration behind Quasartio Inc.'s namesake as a type of star could be the first sign of the Mythical Pokemon's return in Legends: Z-A . Moreover, given that the last games to feature Mega Evolutions were the Gen 3 remakes, Pokemon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire , the return of Mega Evolutions could also include Mythical and Legendary Pokemon with Primal Reversions for Zygarde and Jirachi respectively. Potentially connecting Legends: Z-A 's various storylines, with Quasartico Inc. abusing Jirachi's wish-granting powers, taking over Lumiose City, and reawakening Zygarde, the Z-A Royale may have just inadvertently hinted at Jirachi's return.

The developers of King Legacy are constantly updating the game and providing many new codes. These codes have a significant impact on the experience, especially in the early stages of the game, as they offer a bunch of freebies, including gems, boosts, and cash. Roblox players can scroll down to see the complete list of King Legacy codes, as well as a guide to redeeming them, a list of other games like King Legacy , and information about the game's developers.

How to Redeem Codes in King Legacy

To redeem codes in Roblox: King Legacy , players must follow a few quick steps. To obtain some of the latest supplies from codes, they should input them correctly by copying and pasting the list provided. If a code doesn't work, they should double-check that the spelling is correct. If it still doesn't work, it has likely been redeemed or is no longer available.

  1. Launch King Legacy
  2. Click on the Settings button in the drop-down menu
  3. In the Settings window, click inside the Enter Code box and paste the code
  4. Click Enter to complete the process

King Legacy Tips and Tricks

To begin with, it is necessary to understand that players who want to achieve success must complete many quests. Players can find them in the city. A very important aspect of the game is the selection of enemies by level. Initially, it will be difficult for players to deal with enemies of a higher level, so choose carefully. Using additional skills such as Smash is also very important for victory.

Best Anime Roblox Games Like King Legacy

With thousands of Roblox games available, players often search for something new. The reason for this is that all games get dull over time, and this section aims to help players if and when this occurs. Below, they will find a list of the best Roblox games, like King Legacy :

  • Project Slayers
  • Anime Adventures
  • Shindo Life
  • Ro Ghoul
  • Zo Samurai

About the King Legacy Developers

King Legacy was created by a group of developers called Venture Lagoons. They are pretty popular, and their group on the Roblox website currently has 621K members. Unfortunately, King Legacy is the only game from these developers that is so popular.

item.title: Galaxy Defense Codes (April 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Galaxy Defense Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Galaxy Defense
  • How to Get More Galaxy Defense Codes

Galaxy Defense is a strategy tower defense game where you will need to protect the Earth from the fall of various types of asteroids. To handle it, you'll have a bunch of weapons in your arsenal that you can unlock and use over the game, ranging from machine guns to huge deadly lasers.

To unlock the best weapons faster, you'll need to earn a lot of Diamonds and accumulate other resources for upgrades. Luckily, you can get much closer to your goal by redeeming Galaxy Defense codes, which will bring you a bunch of rewards that will definitely come in handy.

Updated April 1, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: With extra firepower, it's much easier to fight off waves of enemies. Some of the free rewards in this guide give you upgrades, while others unlock in-game currency. These time-limited bonuses will help you stay ahead of new challenges. Be sure to get them before they expire.

All Galaxy Defense Codes

Working Galaxy Defense Codes

  • GDV7VY - Redeem this code to get Enhanced Alloys. (NEW)
  • GDV7HL - Redeem this code to get 100 Diamonds. (NEW)
  • GDFUN - Redeem this code to get 100 Stamina.
  • GDLUCK - Redeem this code to get 100 Diamonds.

Expired Galaxy Defense Codes

  • GDV6VM - Redeem this code to get six Etching Solvents.
  • GDV6HU - Redeem this code to get five Warrior Chest Keys.

Redeeming Galaxy Defense codes is a quick and convenient way to get rare resources and premium currency. So, if you don't want to spend a lot of time grinding or real money to get these rare items, be sure to redeem Galaxy Defense codes.

How to Redeem Codes for Galaxy Defense

Redemption of Galaxy Defense codes will be accessible as soon as you complete your first training match. From there, you can easily redeem your rewards with just a few clicks, and here's how to do it in this free mobile game:

  • Launch Galaxy Defense .
  • Go to the main menu.
  • Pay attention to the upper-left corner of the screen. There will be your avatar. Click on it.
  • This will open the Profile and Settings menu. Here, in the lower part of the menu, you will find the redemption section, which contains an input field and a yellow Exchange button below it. Now, in the input field, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes.
  • Lastly, click on the yellow Exchange button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen with a list of rewards you have received.

How to Get More Galaxy Defense Codes

You can always come back to this page for the latest Galaxy Defense codes, so bookmark it. Also, you can visit the official Galaxy Defense Discord server. Developers often share codes for this mobile game there, so just be careful not to miss them among other messages and announcements.

Galaxy Defense is available on mobile devices.

item.title: InZOI: How to Increase Media Production Skill
item.description:
InZOI enables players to create and customize their own character, known as a Zoi, and then maintain the progression of their day-to-day lives. This includes fulfilling needs, chasing ambitions, developing relationships with other Zois in the city, choosing a career, and even finding love and starting a family of their own.

Among the various mechanics you need to maintain, Skills are a key gameplay aspect that enables Zois to develop and strengthen new hobbies and career paths. Media Production is one of these many different Skills, so knowing how to improve can help you to chase a desired job for your Zoi, as well as give them new ways to find enjoyment or spend their downtime. For those unsure, here's how to improve Media Production in InZOI .

How to Increase the Media Production Skill in InZOI

There are two main ways in which you can increase your Media Production Skills in InZOI . The first way this can be achieved is by interacting with a camera. There are multiple types of cameras available in the game, and they all work to improve this Skill.

The desktop-mounted camera will enable you to take a selfie, while tripod cameras give you the option to take a photo of other Zoi in your life or take a landscape photo of your surroundings. You can also take photos of yourself or other Zois in the city with the use of your phone, which can come in handy for contributing to Media Production whilst out and about.

The second method that you can use is creating videos by editing clips together on a computer. To do this, head over to a desktop computer or laptop, click on it, and then select the Edit Video option from the drop-down menu. This will open the Create Video menu , as seen in the screenshot below.

From here, you will be able to select one of the options available to you, determined by your current Media Production Skill Level. At Level 0, this will involve just as basic 'Edit Video' option, but as you continue to make progress in this area and become more proficient in Media Production, new ideas and creative possibilities will become available for your Zoi to select from this menu.

As you get better at this skill, you will also gain the option to create videos that earn you a small profit upon completion. The higher you continue to raise your Media Production Skill, the more your Zoi will be able to earn for each project they work on. The only downside to this is that these tasks can take up quite a bit of time, so you may also need to take out some time to properly maintain the other needs of your characters.
